TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConfigurationSectionHandler

summary.span: 处理对特定的配置节的访问。

span.span: Handles the access to certain configuration sections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **重要**在.NET Framework 2.0 及更高版本已弃用。**Important** is deprecated in .NET Framework 2.0 and above. 但是，因为它在内部使用，而保留。But, because it is used internally, it has been kept. 你可以找到处的一个示例[如何： 创建自定义配置节使用 IConfigurationSectionHandler](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07f68a3f-2920-4665-a824-47bda744e662)。You can find an example at [How to: Create Custom Configuration Sections Using IConfigurationSectionHandler](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07f68a3f-2920-4665-a824-47bda744e662). 如果你使用前面的示例，请把它生成.NET framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1。If you use the previous example, please build it with the .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版和更高版本，你必须改为派生自类，以实现相关的配置节处理程序。In .NET Framework version 2.0 and above, you must instead derive from the class to implement the related configuration section handler. 你可以找到处的一个示例[如何： 创建自定义配置节使用 ConfigurationSection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/febaca98-c727-4017-95ed-82e2fb6cf234)。You can find an example at [How to: Create Custom Configuration Sections Using ConfigurationSection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/febaca98-c727-4017-95ed-82e2fb6cf234). 实例类必须是线程安全且无状态。Instances of the class must be thread safe and stateless. 方法同时必须可以从多个线程调用。The method must be callable from multiple threads simultaneously. 此外，配置对象生成的方法必须是线程安全且不可变。Furthermore, the configuration object generated by the method must be thread safe and immutable. 配置对象将缓存由配置系统，因为很重要，不能修改的父参数方法。Because the configuration objects are cached by the configuration system, it is important not to modify the parent argument to the method. 例如，如果返回值的是小进行修改的父级，必须在父，而不是原始的克隆上进行实际的修改。For example, if the return value of is only a small modification of the parent, actual modifications must be made on a clone of the parent, not the original.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Create (object parent, object configContext, System.Xml.XmlNode section);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Create(object parent, object configContext, class System.Xml.XmlNode section) cil managed
Public Function Create (parent As Object, configContext As Object, section As XmlNode) As Object
public: System::Object ^ Create(System::Object ^ parent, System::Object ^ configContext, System::Xml::XmlNode ^ section);

returns.span: 创建的节处理程序对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例类必须是线程安全且无状态。Instances of the class must be thread safe and stateless. 方法同时必须可以从多个线程调用。The method must be callable from multiple threads simultaneously. 此外，配置对象生成的方法必须是线程安全且不可变。Furthermore, the configuration object generated by the method must be thread safe and immutable. 配置对象将缓存由配置系统，因为很重要，不能修改的父参数。Because the configuration objects are cached by the configuration system, it is important not to modify the parent argument to . 例如，如果返回值的是小进行修改的父级，必须在父，而不是原始的克隆上进行实际的修改。For example, if the return value of is only a small modification of the parent, actual modifications must be made on a clone of the parent, not the original.
